description: MetricsStraightTool is a handy app that helps you quickly check and understand your measurements. It lets you compare deviation against allowed tolerance and gives an instant Pass/Fail result. You can calculate percentage error, track drift over time, and see the average, minimum, and maximum of repeated readings. The app also gives you basic standard deviation and a simple combined uncertainty so you know how reliable your numbers are. A resolution vs tolerance checker shows if your instrument is fine enough for the job. For calibration work, you can do fast 2-point linear calibration to find slope and offset. You can also fit a straight line using 3 or more calibration points for better accuracy. An angle-to-offset calculator converts angle error into linear displacement, making alignment checks easy.

ToleranceTimeMonitor is a smart app to make measurement and calibration tasks easier. It helps users check tolerance, accuracy, and repeatability with clear and quick tools. The app includes useful calculators like Tolerance Checker Pro, Resolution Adequacy Checker, and Smart Percentage Error for fast checks. You can also find tools to handle multiple readings, monitor drift over time, and calculate standard deviation. For calibration work, it offers 2-Point and Multi-Point Curve Builders along with a handy Correction Table Generator. The Uncertainty Budget Mini helps you estimate total measurement uncertainty with ease. Our goal is to save your time, reduce manual errors, and make every calculation simple, accurate, and reliable.

FluidDensityFlow is a simple and handy app designed for engineers and technicians working with valves, pipes, and flow systems. It helps you perform quick calculations related to fluid flow, pressure, temperature, and mechanical strength — all in one place. The app includes useful tools like mass flow rate, pipe velocity, and valve size suggestion to make your work faster and easier. You can also check choked flow, leakage rate, and pressure ratios with just a few inputs. For mechanical checks, it calculates safety factors and actuator power demands with simple formulas. FluidDensityFlow is built to save time, reduce manual work, and support accurate results in daily engineering tasks. It’s your easy companion for smart and reliable flow system calculations.

ViscosityOptimiserTool is a  easy-to-use app for pump and fluid engineers. It helps you quickly analyse how viscosity and cavitation affect pump performance. The tool includes simple calculators for viscosity correction, suction performance, and cavitation checks. You can easily estimate inducer size, eye diameter, and inlet blade angles for better pump design. It also helps assess tip speed effects, impeller trimming impact, and non-Newtonian flow behaviour. With clear inputs and instant results, the app saves time and improves accuracy. Whether for design, testing, or troubleshooting, ViscosityOptimiserTool makes fluid calculations simple and reliable.

SpanSurveyTrker is a field app to help teams check and record power line patrols with less hassle and fewer mistakes. Inspectors can log each patrol with date, time, GPS spot, span or tower number, weather, issues found, and how serious the problem is, all in one place. Wire height checks are easy too, with simple forms for span ID, GPS, measured height, tool used, and field notes. The app keeps all patrol and wire height records tidy and ready to review later. Built-in converters let you switch load and force units (N, kN, kgf, lbf) and angle units (degrees, radians, slope %) in a few taps. You can also change GPS coordinates between DMS and decimal degrees without leaving the app. Extra tools convert speed (m/s, km/h, mph), tension (kN, lbs, daN), and elevation or height (m, ft), so field staff do not need a calculator. SpanSurveyTrker keeps line survey work simple, clear, and fast for people working outdoors.

DynamicLoadCalci is a smart app made to help engineers, students, and technicians with quick mechanical and load-related calculations. It brings together a set of easy tools like force, pressure, speed, and energy estimators all in one place. You can also check safety factors, plan calibration intervals, and compare instrument readings without any hassle. The app is designed with a clear layout and easy input fields, so anyone can use it without confusion. Whether you are studying mechanics or working in the field, DynamicLoadCalci saves your time and helps you get accurate results. It also includes a unit conversion hub for quick conversions during work. Our goal is to make technical calculations simple, fast, and reliable for everyone.

Unzip is a powerful zip file opener and extractor. Easily extracts ZIP, RAR, 7Z, TAR, GZIP, and other archive formats. Supports creating encrypted ZIP files and extracting multi-volume archives.
◆ Create password-protected ZIP files.
◆ Batch compress videos and photos from the photo library
◆ Compress photos and videos from the album into ZIP files.
◆ To extract multi-volume archives: 1) Make sure all parts are in the same folder; 2) Select the first (main) volume to begin extraction.
◆ Supported archive file formats for decompression: ZIP, RAR, 7Z, TAR, GZIP, GZ, BZIP2, LHA, CAB, LZX, BZ2, BIN, LZMA, ZIPX, ISO, ACE, AES, MSI, CBZ, CBR, and more.
◆ Open and View many document types: DOC, Excel, PPT, PDF, TXT, RTF, CHM, EPUB, JPG, GIF, PNG ... 
◆ Play videos and audios: mp4,avi,mkv,wma,flv,mov,3gp,m4a,wav,wmv,rmvb
◆ Convert JPG and PNG images to PDF files.
◆ File backup and transfer: 
- USB transfer via iTunes File Sharing (upload/download files). 
- WiFi transfer between phone and computer.
- Import files and folders from other apps.	
- Upload to cloud storage:iCloud Drive, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive
